title: Familiar
sinopse:
After their parents' remarriage, Ryohei finds out Nanao, who has just become his brother-in-law, is gay. Ryohei hates gays but in order to hold Nanao back from meeting his sex-friend, he bluntly says 'I will satisfy your sex drive instead of your sex-friend' and forcefully kisses Nanao.

(Source: bl-gyaru)
